info.name: Hercules DJ Console RMX 2
info.author: Maximilian Beiersdorfer, DJMaxergy
info.description: Hercules DJ Console RMX 2 mapping (using script file).

control.description: Left FX PAD 1 - Enables effect 1 of EffectUnit 1.
Left FX PAD 1 + SHIFT - Enables effect 1 of EffectUnit 1 and controls meta its meta knob by velocity.
Left FX PAD 2 - Enables effect 2 of EffectUnit 1.
Left FX PAD 2 + SHIFT - Enables effect 2 of EffectUnit 1 and controls meta its meta knob by velocity.
Left FX PAD 3 - Enables effect 3 of EffectUnit 1.
Left FX PAD 3 + SHIFT - Enables effect 3 of EffectUnit 1 and controls meta its meta knob by velocity.
Left FX PAD 4 - Short press: Shows/hides focus of EffectUnit 1, hold: Enables EffectFocusMode (+ press FX PAD 1..3 to focus an effect).
Left FX Pad 4 + SHIFT - Cycle through effectUnit numbers array.
Left SAMPLE PAD 1 - Load selected track into Sampler (Index 1) if empty, else go to cue point and play - velocity (volume) controlled.
Left SAMPLE PAD 1 + SHIFT - Stop Sampler (Index 1) if playing, else eject loaded track.
Left SAMPLE PAD 2 - Load selected track into Sampler (Index 2) if empty, else go to cue point and play - velocity (volume) controlled.
Left SAMPLE PAD 2 + SHIFT - Stop Sampler (Index 2) if playing, else eject loaded track.
Left SAMPLE PAD 3 - Load selected track into Sampler (Index 3) if empty, else go to cue point and play - velocity (volume) controlled.
Left SAMPLE PAD 3 + SHIFT - Stop Sampler (Index 3) if playing, else eject loaded track.
Left SAMPLE PAD 4 - Load selected track into Sampler (Index 4) if empty, else go to cue point and play - velocity (volume) controlled.
Left SAMPLE PAD 4 + SHIFT - Stop Sampler (Index 4) if playing, else eject loaded track.
Left CUE PAD 1 - Hotcue 1 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Left CUE PAD 1 + SHIFT - Hotcue 1 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Left CUE PAD 2 - Hotcue 2 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Left CUE PAD 2 + SHIFT - Hotcue 2 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Left CUE PAD 3 - Hotcue 3 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Left CUE PAD 3 + SHIFT - Hotcue 3 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Left CUE PAD 4 - Hotcue 4 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Left CUE PAD 4 + SHIFT - Hotcue 4 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Left LOOP PAD 1 - Toggles beatloop over beatloop size.
Left LOOP PAD 1 + SHIFT - Toggles beatlooproll over 1/16 beats.
Left LOOP PAD 2 - Toggles beatloop over 2 beats.
Left LOOP PAD 2 + SHIFT - Toggles beatlooproll over 1/8 beats.
Left LOOP PAD 3 - Toggles beatloop over 4 beats.
Left LOOP PAD 3 + SHIFT - Toggles beatlooproll over 1/4 beats.
Left LOOP PAD 4 - Toggles beatloop over 8 beats.
Left LOOP PAD 4 + SHIFT - Toggles beatlooproll over 1/2 beats.
Right FX PAD 1 - Enables effect 1 of EffectUnit 2.
Right FX PAD 1 + SHIFT - Enables effect 1 of EffectUnit 2 and controls meta its meta knob by velocity.
Right FX PAD 2 - Enables effect 2 of EffectUnit 2.
Right FX PAD 2 + SHIFT - Enables effect 2 of EffectUnit 2 and controls meta its meta knob by velocity.
Right FX PAD 3 - Enables effect 3 of EffectUnit 2.
Right FX PAD 3 + SHIFT - Enables effect 3 of EffectUnit 2 and controls meta its meta knob by velocity.
Right FX PAD 4 - Short press: Shows/hides focus of EffectUnit 2, hold: Enables EffectFocusMode (+ press FX PAD 1..3 to focus an effect).
Right FX Pad 4 + SHIFT - Cycle through effectUnit numbers array.
Right SAMPLE PAD 1 - Load selected track into Sampler (Index 1) if empty, else go to cue point and play - velocity (volume) controlled.
Right SAMPLE PAD 1 + SHIFT - Stop Sampler (Index 1) if playing, else eject loaded track.
Right SAMPLE PAD 2 - Load selected track into Sampler (Index 2) if empty, else go to cue point and play - velocity (volume) controlled.
Right SAMPLE PAD 2 + SHIFT - Stop Sampler (Index 2) if playing, else eject loaded track.
Right SAMPLE PAD 3 - Load selected track into Sampler (Index 3) if empty, else go to cue point and play - velocity (volume) controlled.
Right SAMPLE PAD 3 + SHIFT - Stop Sampler (Index 3) if playing, else eject loaded track.
Right SAMPLE PAD 4 - Load selected track into Sampler (Index 4) if empty, else go to cue point and play - velocity (volume) controlled.
Right SAMPLE PAD 4 + SHIFT - Stop Sampler (Index 4) if playing, else eject loaded track.
Right CUE PAD 1 - Hotcue 1 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Right CUE PAD 1 + SHIFT - Hotcue 1 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Right CUE PAD 2 - Hotcue 2 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Right CUE PAD 2 + SHIFT - Hotcue 2 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Right CUE PAD 3 - Hotcue 3 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Right CUE PAD 3 + SHIFT - Hotcue 3 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Right CUE PAD 4 - Hotcue 4 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Right CUE PAD 4 + SHIFT - Hotcue 4 HotcueButton behavior of components lib.
Right LOOP PAD 1 - Toggles beatloop over beatloop size.
Right LOOP PAD 1 + SHIFT - Toggles beatlooproll over 1/16 beats.
Right LOOP PAD 2 - Toggles beatloop over 2 beats.
Right LOOP PAD 2 + SHIFT - Toggles beatlooproll over 1/8 beats.
Right LOOP PAD 3 - Toggles beatloop over 4 beats.
Right LOOP PAD 3 + SHIFT - Toggles beatlooproll over 1/4 beats.
Right LOOP PAD 4 - Toggles beatloop over 8 beats.
Right LOOP PAD 4 + SHIFT - Toggles beatlooproll over 1/2 beats.
Left PLAY button - PlayButton behavior of components lib.
Left CUE button - CueButton behavior of components lib.
Left SYNC button - SyncButton behavior of components lib.
Left LOAD button - Load selected track, +SHIFT - Eject track.
Left REWIND button - Fast backward in loaded track.
Left FORWARD button - Fast forward in loaded track.
Left KILL TREBLE button - High frequencies kill.
Left KILL MEDIUM button - Middle frequencies kill.
Left KILL BASS button - Low frequencies kill.
Left SOURCE button - Toggle pass thru.
Left PITCH BEND MINUS button - Pitch bend down.
Left PITCH BEND PLUS button - Pitch bend up.
Left PREVIEW button - Toggle pfl, +SHIFT - Toggle keylock.
Left JOG WHEEL PRESSED DOWN - Toggles scratching.
Left SHIFT button.
Left SHIFT button.
Left SHIFT button.
Left JOG - Jog playing track, faster/slower (regular).
Right JOG - Jog playing track, faster/slower (regular).
Right PLAY button - PlayButton behavior of components lib.
Left JOG SCRATCH - Scratch playing track.
Right CUE button - CueButton behavior of components lib.
Right JOG SCRATCH - Scratch playing track.
Right SYNC button - SyncButton behavior of components lib.
Left LOOP MODE encoder - Adjust beatloop size.
Right LOAD button - Load selected track, +SHIFT - Eject track.
Right LOOP MODE encoder - Adjust beatloop size.
Left PITCH FADER MSB - Rate (speed control).
Right REWIND button - Fast backward in loaded track.
Left PITCH FADER LSB - Rate (speed control).
Right FORWARD button - Fast forward in loaded track.
Right PITCH FADER MSB - Rate (speed control).
Right KILL TREBLE button - High frequencies kill.
Right PITCH FADER LSB - Rate (speed control).
Right KILL MEDIUM button - Middle frequencies kill.
Left VOLUME FADER MSB - Volume.
Right KILL BASS button - Low frequencies kill.
Left VOLUME FADER LSB - Volume.
Right SOURCE button - Toggle pass thru.
Left TREBLE knob MSB - High frequencies control.
Right PITCH BEND MINUS button - Pitch bend down.
Left TREBLE knob LSB - High frequencies control.
Right PITCH BEND PLUS button - Pitch bend up.
Left MEDIUM knob MSB - Middle frequencies control.
Right PREVIEW button - Toggle pfl, +SHIFT - Toggle keylock.
Left MEDIUM knob LSB - Middle frequencies control.
Right JOG WHEEL PRESSED DOWN - Toggles scratching.
Left BASS knob MSB - Low frequencies control, +SHIFT - filter (QuickEffectRack) control.
Right SHIFT button.
Right SHIFT button.
Right SHIFT button.
Left BASS knob LSB - Low frequencies control.
Left GAIN knob MSB - Pregain.
FILES button - Go To Item in Library, +SHIFT - Add to bottom of Auto DJ playlist.
Left GAIN knob LSB - Pregain.
FOLDERS button - Move focus backward in Library, +SHIFT - Toggle Auto DJ.
MAIN VOLUME knob MSB - Master volume.
UP button - Move vertically up in Library.
MAIN VOLUME knob LSB - Master volume.
DOWN button - Move vertically down in Library.
CUE TO MIX knob MSB - Headmix.
VINYL(SCRATCH) button - Split headcue, +SHIFT - Maximize library.
CUE TO MIX knob LSB - Headmix.
MIC ON/OFF (MICROPHONE TALK OVER) button - Toggle microphone on/off and talkover on/off.
CROSS FADER MSB.
CROSS FADER LSB.
Right VOLUME FADER MSB - Volume.
Right VOLUME FADER LSB - Volume.
Right TREBLE knob MSB - High frequencies control.
Right TREBLE knob LSB - High frequencies control.
Right MEDIUM knob MSB - Middle frequencies control.
Right MEDIUM knob LSB - Middle frequencies control.
Right BASS knob MSB - Low frequencies control, +SHIFT - filter (QuickEffectRack) control.
Right BASS knob LSB - Low frequencies control, +SHIFT - filter (QuickEffectRack) control.
Left REWIND button +SHIFT - Spinback effect.
Right GAIN knob MSB - Pregain.
Left FORWARD button +SHIFT - Brake effect.
Right GAIN knob LSB - Pregain.
Left PITCH BEND MINUS button +SHIFT - Decrement (halve) pitch range.
Left FX MODE encoder - EffectUnit's mix knob, in EffectFocusMode in combination with ParameterEditMode - Controls effect's parameters.
Left PITCH BEND PLUS button +SHIFT - Increment (double) pitch range.
Right FX MODE encoder - EffectUnit's mix knob, in EffectFocusMode in combination with ParameterEditMode - Controls effect's parameters.
Right REWIND button +SHIFT - Spinback effect.
Left SAMPLE MODE encoder - Switch between 4 sampler banks (each of 4 samplers).
Right FORWARD button +SHIFT - Brake effect.
Right SAMPLE MODE encoder - Switch between 4 sampler banks (each of 4 samplers).
Right PITCH BEND MINUS button +SHIFT - Decrement (halve) pitch range.
Left CUE MODE encoder - Adjust key of loaded track.
Right PITCH BEND PLUS button +SHIFT - Increment (double) pitch range.
Right CUE MODE encoder - Adjust key of loaded track.
Left LOOP MODE encoder + SHIFT - Move loop forward/backward.
Right LOOP MODE encoder + SHIFT - Move loop forward/backward.
Left FX MODE encoder + SHIFT - EffectUnit's super knob.
Right FX MODE encoder + SHIFT - EffectUnit's super knob.
InboundSysex data evaluation.
